{{Description|The knights all believe that Klee must have a lucky star watching over her to have never been hurt by any of her own bombs...}}
'''Sparks 'n' Splash''' is [[Klee]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The effects of this skill end when Klee leaves the field.
* Sparks 'n' Splash can be triggered once every '''1.8''' seconds, resulting in '''6''' instances.
** The first Sparks 'n' Splash is triggered '''1''' second after the burst animation, and the last Sparks 'n' Splash is triggered at the very end of the 10s duration.
* Each Sparks 'n' Splash sends '''4''' sparks, randomly [[targeting]] all enemies.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|4|Sparkly Explosion}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|5|Nova Burst}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|6|Blazing Delight|After using this talent, all party members' {{Color|Pyro DMG Bonus}} is increased by 10% for 25 seconds, and all party members other than Klee gain 3 [[energy]] every 3 seconds until this talent ends.}}
